sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is one of many conservatives upset about the Department of Homeland Security's new Disinformation Governance Board, calling it a "bureau of disinformation" and a "belated April Fool's joke."
author: Hannah Getahun
title: DeSantis calls DHS Disinformation Governance Board a 'belated April Fool's joke'
